content: this legal document outlines an agreement between three individuals referred to as tc tl and td regarding the ownership of a building located in the municipality of castelfidardo the building includes apartments garages and common areas each individual is assigned a specific share of the property with tc receiving half tl receiving a quarter and td receiving a quarter the document provides a detailed description of each apartment and its corresponding cadastral data as well as the specified value of each share the agreement terminates the existing joint ownership and establishes individual ownership for each party
